parameters:
\N<Training Troops Receptionist>A training session is currently being held inside. Those who
are not participants cannot proceed any further.
<ActiveMessage:\C[10]■EV発生■>

\N<Segi>...Oh, I have come to the training assembly as a proxy for
my husband Yuia. My name is Segi...

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>Hmm... You are here for your second battle today. First of
all, let me praise you for not running away and showing up.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>As with the last time, in order for you to fight on the
stage of the training assembly, we need to process a
temporary exemption from your husband Yuia's charges.
Present the relevant documents.
\N<Segi>...Please do.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>Very well. The match will start shortly. As usual, first don
the black garb and move to the warriors' waiting room.
\N<Segi>...Yes.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>...I watched your previous battle. Mind. Even with the
enhancement effects of Lyuda, standing on that stage as a
woman is highly commendable.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>But your spirited effort will not last long. Indeed, that
spirit medicine is surely eroding your body. You must feel
its effects more than anyone else, don't you?
\N<Segi>...

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>Hmph... It seems you are indeed aware of it. Moreover, your
opponent this time is not an amateur like Hojiko from
before. You surely won't be able to fight as you are now.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>Heh, I wonder how far you can go with that body eroded by
the spirit medicine. Show me the extent of your resolve and
determination.
セギ02
face01
Actor1_1
B
weather : 0 : 5 : 5 : 15 : 1 : Light_01D : 1
weather : 1 : 5 : 5 : 5 : 1 : Light_01C : 1

\N<Segi>...I can't run away. For Lord Yuia's sake... for Riia's
sake. I have to do this...
air06
air05
<ActiveMessage:\C[10]■EV発生■>

\N<Rame>Miss Segi... is Mom really going to be okay? She's... she's
not coming back and... I'm so worried...
\N<Segi>Don't worry... It's going to be fine. It has to be fine.

\N<Rame>Right... it should be. I-I should believe that... but I
can't stop shaking.
\N<Rame>Until Mom comes back safely... c-can you stay with me?

\N<Segi>Of course, let's wait here together. Don't worry, she'll
definitely come back safe and sound.
\N<Rame>Really...?

\N<Segi>Yes, so let's greet your mother with smiles on our faces,
without making her anxious.
\N<Rame>Y-Yes...
\N<Fubii>Ah-ah, spouting such convenient lies.
2_セギ23a
\N<Segi>You are...
\N<Fubii>Hello, auntie. Rame's with you too?
\N<Rame>Fubii...
\N<Segi>What do you mean by that? What's this about convenient lies?

\N<Fubii>Ahaha, because it's true, isn't it? Even auntie is anxious
despite pretending not to be.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Fubii>Right? Auntie understands better than this innocent child
here what it means for a woman to take part in this battle,
doesn't she?
\N<Segi>Even so... that doesn't mean we should stop believing.

\N<Fubii>Ahaha, you have to keep your spirits up, otherwise you feel
like you'll be crushed by the anxiety, right? I get it, even
adults want to scream out their fears sometimes, don't they?
\N<Segi>Don't act like you know everything.

\N<Fubii>But I do know, I understand. I understand what's in the
hearts of auntie and that child.
2_セギ23b
\N<Segi>Wha...?!
\N<Rame>Eh...?!

\N<Fubii>Ahaha, look, losing a battle means having to endure this,
right? The loser has to obey whatever they're told.

\N<Fubii>Regardless of Rame, isn't this what everyone really wants
from auntie?
\N<Rame>St-Stop...!
\N<Fubii>Even Rame's mom will face this if she loses, you get it?
\N<Rame>Mom... lose?
\N<Segi>Stop... let go of me!

\N<Segi>Rame-chan, it's okay. We don't need to listen to him. Mom
will definitely not lose.

\N<Fubii>You think so? Then why are you two huddled together here
shaking? If you're so sure of victory, why not watch the
match with confidence?

\N<Segi>You wouldn't understand...! You can't just barge into
people's hearts like that!

\N<Fubii>Ahaha, sorry about that. I'm also a participant in this
battle, just wanted to tease a little.
\N<Segi>You're... a participant?

\N<Fubii>Yeah, surprising? It would be nice to meet auntie on the
stage too, huh?
\N<Segi>I-I'm not participating in any battle...

\N<Fubii>Huh? Really? Well, whatever. Oh yeah, auntie is Riia's mom,
right? Say hello to Riia for me?
\N<Segi>Grr...

\N<Fubii>And... look? I was right after all. This is what everyone
wants. Everyone's watching auntie with lecherous eyes.
\N<Segi>Wha...?
\N<The Men Around>...

\N<Fubii>And as proof, no one's trying to stop me. Rather, it feels
like they're thinking I did a good job, doesn't it?
\N<Segi>N-No...!
2_セギ23c
\N<Segi>Wha...?!

\N<Fubii>So, to meet everyone's expectations, why don't you be a
little more accommodating? The people here are pretty lucky,
huh.
\N<Segi>Stop... Enough already!
\N<Segi>Haa... Haa!

\N<Fubii>Ouch ouch... Hehe. Is this what they call the dignity of
someone superior? You're not just trembling in fear like
Rame.
\N<Rame>...

\N<Fubii>It's a loss for me if I get hit any more than this. I think
I'll take my leave now.

\N<Fubii>Well, regardless of what auntie does, Rame, you should think
carefully about what I said.
\N<Rame>Segi-san... What he said...

\N<Segi>...It's okay, if it's Mom, she'll definitely come back
safely.
\N<Rame>Y-Yes...

\N<Man>To win in the training bouts, strength is obviously
necessary, but knowledge of your opponent is absolutely
essential. It's not so sweet that you can win through with
mere brute courage.
\N<Segi>Miss Irime.
\N<Irime>Hey, Segi. Did you come to cheer me on again today?

\N<Segi>Yes. It seems you've won your battle safely again, which is
a relief.

\N<Irime>Ahaha, thank you. But shouldn't you be worrying about
yourself? Your next match is against a tough opponent, isn't
it?

\N<Segi>That is... well... yes. I think it's going to be a tough
fight...
\N<Irime>...I see. Then... that...
\N<Segi>Huh...?
\N<Irime>N-no, it's nothing. Don't worry about it.

\N<Irime>Rame, I have something important to discuss with Segi.
Sorry, but could you go on ahead and head back first?
\N<Rame>Yeah... understood. Segi-san, see you again...
\N<Segi>...Yes.

\N<Irime>That... Can I ask you something? About your next opponent.
Of course, I won't tell anyone.
\N<Segi>Eh...? Y-yes.

\N<Irime>Fubii... huh. I see, that cheeky young master who's renting
a room above the armory shop.

\N<Segi>Yes. According to what Zuuteruka told me, he has mastered
excellent combat skills...

\N<Irime>Ah, I've heard those rumors too. Something about him single-
handedly annihilating a band of thieves...

\N<Irime>Well, rumors tend to get exaggerated. Take it with a grain
of salt.
\N<Segi>I hope... that's the case.

\N<Irime>...With that physique, he surely doesn't have the strength
of a burly man. That means he's likely to use his agility to
avoid attacks, employing a fighting style that doesn't let
the opponent land a hit.
\N<Segi>A fighting style that doesn't let the opponent land a hit...

\N<Irime>Right, which means we should do the opposite. If we can
catch him in range and possibly take away his agility with
our tactics, then maybe...
\N<Segi>...

\N<Segi>...That's right. By the way, Miss Irime, what happened with
that matter? You mentioned yesterday that the real battle
starts after this one or something...
\N<Irime>Oh... about that...

\N<Ryuda Soldier>...Hold on. It is forbidden to disclose information to
participants before a match. That's enough.
\N<Irime>...

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Also... you are today's winner. Before engaging in
unnecessary conversation, promptly proceed with the
preparations for the next match.
\N<Irime>...Right.

\N<Irime>...Sorry about this. It seems that's how things are. Looks
like I won't be of any help after all.
\N<Segi>...Yes. Please don't worry about it.
DW_目標設定 練兵会へ向け、情報を収集する
A

\N<Fubii>Hey, auntie. We've been seeing each other quite often
lately, haven't we?
\N<Segi>...

\N<Ryuda Soldier>As a life-prolonging measure for your husband who is
imprisoned, you are obligated to pay gold every 5 days
during the training period.
\N<Ryuda Soldier>The amount imposed on you this time is \C[1][1250 MO]\C[0].
\N<Ryuda Soldier>Are you prepared to make the payment this time?\$
Ready to go
Preparing
I'm not ready
準備出来ている

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Hmm... indeed. You have worked hard. It would be good for
you to continue to strive in the future.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>However... should you, out of self-love, interrupt the
payment, we will simply carry out the procedure solemnly.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>What is this? You also do not have enough money on hand to
meet the conditions.
A
準備中
用意は出来ない
\N<Segi>...

\N<Ryuda Soldier>What's wrong? Silence won't start anything. Do what you must
do.
\N<Segi>Th-that is...

\N<Ryuda Soldier>...I see. I understand everything. It seems you were not up
to the task after all.

\N<Segi>W-wait, please! If you could just wait a little longer, I
will definitely have the money...!

\N<Ryuda Soldier>You have already been given ample grace period. There will
be no further leniency.
\N<Segi>But, but...!!

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Come. I said you were not up to the task, but fortunately,
it seems you still have some value to us.
town1
town3
A

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Your husband Yuia's temporary exemption has already been
approved. All that's left is for you yourself to take the
stage at the military training assembly.
